description:
The investment seeks to track the investment results (before fees and expenses) of the Wilshire US Micro-Cap IndexSM (the "underlying index").
 The fund generally will invest at least 90% of its total assets in the securities that comprise the underlying index. The index represents a float-adjusted, market capitalization-weighted index of the issues ranked below 2500 by market capitalization of the Wilshire 5000. The fund is non-diversified.
